name: Satantarium
description: A satanic cult has summoned a demon to the old abandoned asylum on the edge of town. You were too late to stop them, so it's up to you. No matter what, you have to keep the evil from escaping. So, now you just have to survive the night, defeat an army of tortured souls from Hell and slay the demon that commands them. Sounds like a piece of cake...... right?
